name: The adventurer of the board
description:
This is a game where your character, a hero from ancient Rome, moves around a board in order to kill mythological monsters. As the game progresses, he will collect equipment that will allow him to defeat stronger and stronger monsters, and finally reach the end of the board.

Font used: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Freckle+Face#standard-styles

Musics: - Dayside by Yubatake: https://opengameart.org/content/dayside

                 - The Last Encounter by Mathew Paolo http://www.matthewpablo.com
